group_1.textRight: Miiissss!@We got all the ingredieeents!

group_1.textLeft: Woah! There's so much! Thank you, truly!
We're a little short on a time to be opening...
But it's so impressive that just three of you@managed to collect so much!
How on earth did you do it?

group_1.textRight: It's easy...
'Cause we're...
Magical Girls, you see...

group_1.textLeft: ...Pardon?

group_1.textRight: We're Magical Girls. Don't you know?

group_1.textLeft: Erm...like from anime I saw when I was little...?
*Chuckle*... That's a blast from the past.@But you guys are at that age I suppose.

group_1.textRight: Don't even try playin' dumb.
W-well you see, miss employee, I'm actually@an invisible person...
Humans without magic are unable to see me...
You really oughta be truthful with us,@especially for your own sake.

group_1.textLeft: .....@[wait:1.0][chara:800600:lipSynch_1]Hehe...
So you guys are as well.
A Labyrinth...was here after all.

group_1.textRight: Do you think the trucks were dragged into it too...?

group_1.textLeft: What are you saying?@Was this not all because of a Witch?

group_1.textRight: I just don't know...
But we have to go, don't we?

group_1.textLeft: Right.
Even if it has nothing to do with CoCoIchi,@we can't let a Witch get away.
Brace yourselves!
This situation may be more complicated@than we imagined.
Sorry for the wait!
Here we are again!@The Lucky Topping Corner!
We will be introducing various CoCoIchi toppings@here every time.
And after that, we will announce the lucky forecast@of the day!

group_1.textRight: A brilliant plan.

group_1.textLeft: Today's guest is Bread!

group_1.textRight: It's PITA!!
Wait, I MEAN! It's Ria!!

group_1.textLeft: T-then, your favorite topping, please!

group_1.textRight: Watch this! Yachiyo Nanami!
I shall reveal a much more sophisticated menu@than yours and snatch the corner all for myself!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.

group_1.textRight: Oh ho ho!@My choice comes from the store's exclusive menu!

group_1.textLeft: The store's exclusive menu?@They have such a thing...?
There are about 100 stores across the country with@exclusive menus that capitalize on local specialties...
I've eaten some myself.

group_1.textRight: Correct! On a family outing, I just so happened to...
Eh?! Yachiyo Nanami, you knew that as well?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, when I'm on far away work trips@I've occasionally had them...

group_1.textRight: Work...! Far away...?!

group_1.textLeft: I also go outside of Kamihama for work,
so I'm always really looking forward to local and@exclusive menus.

group_1.textRight: Kgh... I didn't expect her to upstage me with her@CoCoIchi trivia,
but to flaunt her modeling career too...
Bravo! You've defeated me!

group_1.textLeft: Here's the fortune! If you order from a store's@exclusive menu today...
You may find a pair of socks that you thought@were lost in your travel bag!

group_1.textRight: Those who want to add some color to your travels,@take a detour to CoCoIchi!

group_1.textLeft: Up next is the Login Bonus Corner!
